item.text: “These are the names of the tribes: From the northern end beside the road of Hethlon to Lebo Hamath, as far as Hazar Enan (which is on the border of Damascus, toward the north beside Hamath), extending from the east side to the west, Dan will have one portion.

<st data-num="05921" class="">Next to</st> the <st data-num="01366" class="">border</st> of <st data-num="01835" class="">Dan</st>, from the <st data-num="06921" class="">east</st> <st data-num="06285" class="">side</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="03220" class="">west</st> <st data-num="06285" class="">side</st>, <st data-num="0836" class="">Asher</st><n id="1" /> will have <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> portion.

<st data-num="05921" class="">Next to</st> the <st data-num="01366" class="">border</st> of <st data-num="0836" class="">Asher</st> from the <st data-num="06921" class="">east</st> <st data-num="06285" class="">side</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="03220" class="">west</st> <st data-num="06285" class="">side</st>, <st data-num="05321" class="">Naphtali</st> will have <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> portion.

<st data-num="05921" class="">Next to</st> the <st data-num="01366" class="">border</st> of <st data-num="05321" class="">Naphtali</st> from the <st data-num="06921" class="">east</st> <st data-num="06285" class="">side</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="03220" class="">west</st> <st data-num="06285" class="">side</st>, <st data-num="04519" class="">Manasseh</st> will have <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> portion.

<st data-num="05921" class="">Next to</st> the <st data-num="01366" class="">border</st> of <st data-num="04519" class="">Manasseh</st> from the <st data-num="06921" class="">east</st> <st data-num="06285" class="">side</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="03220" class="">west</st> <st data-num="06285" class="">side</st>, <st data-num="0669" class="">Ephraim</st> will have <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> portion.

<st data-num="05921" class="">Next to</st> the <st data-num="01366" class="">border</st> of <st data-num="0669" class="">Ephraim</st> from the <st data-num="06921" class="">east</st> <st data-num="06285" class="">side</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="03220" class="">west</st> <st data-num="06285" class="">side</st>, <st data-num="07205" class="">Reuben</st> will have <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> portion.
Next to the border of Reuben from the east side to the west side, Judah will have one portion.

“Next to the border of Judah from the east side to the west side will be the allotment you must set apart. It is to be 8¼ miles wide and the same length as one of the tribal portions, from the east side to the west side; the sanctuary will be in the middle of it.
The allotment you set apart to the Lord will be 8¼ miles in length and 3⅓ miles in width.

These will be the allotments for the holy portion: for the priests, toward the north 8¼ miles in length, toward the west 3⅓ miles in width, toward the east 3⅓ miles in width, and toward the south 8¼ miles in length; the sanctuary of the Lord will be in the middle.

This will be for the <st data-num="03548" class="">priests</st> who are <st data-num="06942" class="">set apart</st> from the <st data-num="01121" class="">descendants</st> of <st data-num="06659" class="">Zadok</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> <st data-num="08104" class="">kept</st> my <st data-num="04931" class="">charge</st> and did <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="08582" class="">go astray</st> when the <st data-num="01121" class="">people</st> of <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st> <st data-num="08582" class="">strayed off</st>, <st data-num="0834" class="">as</st> the <st data-num="03881" class="">Levites</st> <st data-num="08582" class="">did</st>.<n id="1" />
It will be their portion from the allotment of the land, a Most Holy Place, next to the border of the Levites.
“Alongside the border of the priests, the Levites will have an allotment 8¼ miles in length and 3⅓ miles in width. The whole length will be 8¼ miles and the width 3⅓ miles.
They must not sell or exchange any of it; they must not transfer this choice portion of land, for it is set apart to the Lord.
“The remainder, 1⅔ miles in width and 8¼ miles in length, will be for common use by the city, for houses and for open space. The city will be in the middle of it;

<st data-num="0428" class="">these</st> will be its <st data-num="04060" class="">measurements</st>: The <st data-num="06828" class="">north</st> <st data-num="06285" class="">side</st> will be <st data-num="02568 03967 0702 0505">1½</st> miles,<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="05045" class="">south</st> <st data-num="06285" class="">side</st> <st data-num="02568 03967 0702 0505">1½</st> miles, the <st data-num="06921" class="">east</st> <st data-num="06285" class="">side</st> <st data-num="02568 03967 0702 0505">1½</st> miles, and the <st data-num="03220" class="">west</st> <st data-num="06285" class="">side</st> <st data-num="02568 03967 0702 0505">1½</st> miles.

The <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st> will <st data-num="01961" class="">have</st> <st data-num="04054" class="">open spaces</st>: On the <st data-num="06828" class="">north</st> there will be <st data-num="02572 03967">437½</st> feet,<n id="1" /> on the <st data-num="05045" class="">south</st> <st data-num="02572 03967">437½</st> feet, on the <st data-num="06921" class="">east</st> <st data-num="02572 03967">437½</st> feet, and on the <st data-num="03220" class="">west</st> <st data-num="02572 03967">437½</st> feet.

The <st data-num="03498" class="">remainder</st> of the <st data-num="0753" class="">length</st> <st data-num="05980" class="">alongside</st> the <st data-num="06944" class="">holy</st> <st data-num="08641" class="">allotment</st> will be <st data-num="06235 0505">3⅓</st> miles<n id="1" /> to the <st data-num="06921" class="">east</st> and <st data-num="06235 0505">3⅓</st> miles toward the <st data-num="03220" class="">west</st>, and it will <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> <st data-num="05980" class="">beside</st> the <st data-num="06944" class="">holy</st> <st data-num="08641" class="">allotment</st>. Its <st data-num="08393" class="">produce</st> will <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> for <st data-num="03899" class="">food</st> for the <st data-num="05647" class="">workers</st> of the <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st>.

The <st data-num="05647" class="">workers</st> of the <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st> from <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="07626" class="">tribes</st> of <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st> will <st data-num="05647" class="">cultivate</st> it.
The whole allotment will be 8¼ miles square; you must set apart the holy allotment with the possession of the city.

“The rest, on both sides of the holy allotment and the property of the city, will belong to the prince. Extending from the 8¼ miles of the holy allotment to the east border and westward from the 8¼ miles to the west border, alongside the portions, it will belong to the prince. The holy allotment and the sanctuary of the temple will be in the middle of it.
The property of the Levites and of the city will be in the middle of that which belongs to the prince. The portion between the border of Judah and the border of Benjamin will be for the prince.
“As for the rest of the tribes: From the east side to the west side, Benjamin will have one portion.

<st data-num="05921" class="">Next to</st> the <st data-num="01366" class="">border</st> of <st data-num="01144" class="">Benjamin</st>, from the <st data-num="06921" class="">east</st> <st data-num="06285" class="">side</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="03220" class="">west</st> <st data-num="06285" class="">side</st>, <st data-num="08095" class="">Simeon</st> will have <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> portion.

<st data-num="05921" class="">Next to</st> the <st data-num="01366" class="">border</st> of <st data-num="08095" class="">Simeon</st>, from the <st data-num="06921" class="">east</st> <st data-num="06285" class="">side</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="03220" class="">west</st> <st data-num="06285" class="">side</st>, <st data-num="03485" class="">Issachar</st> will have <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> portion.

<st data-num="05921" class="">Next to</st> the <st data-num="01366" class="">border</st> of <st data-num="03485" class="">Issachar</st>, from the <st data-num="06921" class="">east</st> <st data-num="06285" class="">side</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="03220" class="">west</st> <st data-num="06285" class="">side</st>, <st data-num="02074" class="">Zebulun</st> will have <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> portion.

<st data-num="05921" class="">Next to</st> the <st data-num="01366" class="">border</st> of <st data-num="02074" class="">Zebulun</st>, from the <st data-num="06921" class="">east</st> <st data-num="06285" class="">side</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="03220" class="">west</st> <st data-num="06285" class="">side</st>, <st data-num="01410" class="">Gad</st> will have <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> portion.

<st data-num="05921" class="">Next to</st> the <st data-num="01366" class="">border</st> of <st data-num="01410" class="">Gad</st>, <st data-num="0413" class="">at</st> the <st data-num="05045 08486">south</st> <st data-num="06285" class="">side</st>, the <st data-num="01366" class="">border</st> will <st data-num="01961" class="">run</st> from <st data-num="08559" class="">Tamar</st> to the <st data-num="04325" class="">waters</st> of <st data-num="04808" class="">Meribah</st> <st data-num="06946" class="">Kadesh</st>, to the <st data-num="05158" class="">Stream</st> of Egypt,<n id="1" /> and <st data-num="05921" class="">on to</st> the <st data-num="01419" class="">Great</st> <st data-num="03220" class="">Sea</st>.
This is the land that you will allot to the tribes of Israel, and these are their portions, declares the Sovereign Lord.
“These are the exits of the city: On the north side, 1½ miles by measure,

the <st data-num="08179" class="">gates</st> of the <st data-num="05892" class="">city</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="05921" class="">will be</st> <st data-num="08034" class="">named</st> for the <st data-num="07626" class="">tribes</st> of <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st>. There will be <st data-num="07969" class="">three</st> <st data-num="08179" class="">gates</st> to the <st data-num="06828" class="">north</st>: <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="08179" class="">gate</st> for <st data-num="07205" class="">Reuben</st>, <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="08179" class="">gate</st> for <st data-num="03063" class="">Judah</st>, and <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="08179" class="">gate</st> for <st data-num="03878" class="">Levi</st>.

<st data-num="0413" class="">On</st> the <st data-num="06921" class="">east</st> <st data-num="06285" class="">side</st>, <st data-num="02568 03967 0702 0505">1½</st> miles in length, there will be <st data-num="07969" class="">three</st> <st data-num="08179" class="">gates:</st> <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="08179" class="">gate</st> for <st data-num="03130" class="">Joseph</st>, <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="08179" class="">gate</st> for <st data-num="01144" class="">Benjamin</st>, and <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="08179" class="">gate</st> for <st data-num="01835" class="">Dan</st>.

On the <st data-num="05045" class="">south</st> <st data-num="06285" class="">side</st>, <st data-num="02568 03967 0702 0505">1½</st> miles by <st data-num="04060" class="">measure</st>, there will be <st data-num="07969" class="">three</st> <st data-num="08179" class="">gates</st>: <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="08179" class="">gate</st> for <st data-num="08095" class="">Simeon</st>, <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="08179" class="">gate</st> for <st data-num="03485" class="">Issachar</st>, and <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="08179" class="">gate</st> for <st data-num="02074" class="">Zebulun</st>.

On the <st data-num="03220" class="">west</st> <st data-num="06285" class="">side</st>, <st data-num="02568 03967 0702 0505">1½</st> miles in length, there will be <st data-num="07969" class="">three</st> <st data-num="08179" class="">gates</st>: <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="08179" class="">gate</st> for <st data-num="01410" class="">Gad</st>, <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="08179" class="">gate</st> for <st data-num="0836" class="">Asher</st>, and <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="08179" class="">gate</st> for <st data-num="05321" class="">Naphtali</st>.
The circumference of the city will be 6 miles. The name of the city from that day forward will be: ‘The Lord Is There.’”
